item.title: Microsoft Teams PSTN Record Calls to Microsoft Lists with Power Automate
item.author: David Ponce de Leon
item.description: Introduction After my final thoughts on my article PSTN call records with Microsoft Graph I wanted to move this data to Microsoft Lists with Power Automate The benefits are quite a few as expressed before : More granular control over how the process is automated via Microsoft Graph Access leveraging all the possible queries and correlating information that Graph offers. This process allows to run as a scheduled task or even as an Azure function.
